GapFillInput.Title: Years, decades and centuries
GapFillInput.Instruction: Choose a word from the pool. Type your answers in each gap.

Content.Question:
1. Uruguay won the first football World Cup in 1930.
2. Beethoven lived from 1770 to 1827.
3. Jazz music became popular in the nineteen twenties.
4. The first computer game came out in 1972.
5. Pablo Picasso worked in the early twentieth century.
6. The Spice Girls were famous in the UK in the nineteen nineties.
7. The Italian writer Dante lived from 1265 to 1321.
8. Margaret Thatcher was Prime Minister of Britain in the nineteen eighties.
9. Queen Elizabeth I lived in the sixteenth century.
10. The Athens Olympics were in 2004.
